content.query:
-- =============================================================================
-- European Soccer Events
-- Azure Synapse Analytics Demo
-- https://github.com/aessing/demo-azuresynapse
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- Developer.......: Andre Essing (https://www.andre-essing.de/)
--                                (https://github.com/aessing)
--                                (https://twitter.com/aessing)
--                                (https://www.linkedin.com/in/aessing/)
-- -----------------------------------------------------------------------------
-- THIS CODE AND INFORMATION ARE PROVIDED "AS IS" WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND,
-- EITHER EXPRESSED OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO THE IMPLIED
-- WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND/OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
-- =============================================================================

IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM sys.objects WHERE NAME = 'GameEvents' AND TYPE = 'U')
CREATE TABLE Spark.GameEvents
	(
	 id_odsp nvarchar(32),
	 id_event nvarchar(32),
	 sort_order int,
	 time int,
	 event_type int,
	 event_type_str nvarchar(32),
	 event_type2 int,
	 event_type2_str nvarchar(32),
	 side int,
	 side_str nvarchar(16),
	 event_team nvarchar(128),
	 opponent nvarchar(128),
	 player nvarchar(128),
	 player2 nvarchar(128),
	 player_in nvarchar(128),
	 player_out nvarchar(128),
	 shot_place int,
	 shot_place_str nvarchar(64),
	 shot_outcome int,
	 shot_outcome_str nvarchar(64),
	 is_goal int,
	 location int,
	 location_str nvarchar(64),
	 bodypart int,
	 bodypart_str nvarchar(64),
	 assist_method int,
	 assist_method_str nvarchar(64),
	 situation int,
	 situation_str nvarchar(64),
	 country_code nchar(3),
	 time_bin float
	)
WITH
	(
	DISTRIBUTION = ROUND_ROBIN,
	CLUSTERED COLUMNSTORE INDEX
	-- HEAP
	)
GO
